# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been valued at $100 by many satisfied customers. Given its high quality and unique features, I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. Considering its worth to others and the benefits it offers, I am extending this opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $95. This is an excellent chance to acquire a valuable item at a discount. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
